comments.body: The patch fixes the issue and at the same time increases test coverage.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Patch applied to trunk in revision 650562, and merged to the 1.4 branch in revision 650566.

Thanks!

description: CompactNodeTypeDefWriter writes {}* instead of * for residual properties.
summary: CompactNodeTypeDefWriter uses bad format for residual properties
